comment: This class is so easy, since it was a lab class. You mostly just follow directions in class, do the lab, then do the worksheet. That's it, that's all you have to do to pass the class. NO final exam, no midterm, all worksheets done in class all year.

I had Dr. Sirochman for PHYS 2211L and he was amazing! He would thoroughly explain the concepts behind each lab and the actual procedures. If we had any questions, he was happy to help. He seemed to enjoy the class which made it a very comfortable environment. He also made an effort to talk to every student and know their name which was sweet.
Love the guy. So knowledgeable and very talkative. His lab is very easy and he explains things really well.
Just take this guy. Easiest A of my life. He is funny, drops a lab, and grades leniently.
PHYS2211 Lab: His labs are pretty easy and he's a lenient grader. He's funny and genuinely cares for his students, I wish he taught lecture for phys 2 so I can take him for lecture next semester.

Dr. Sirochman is the best physics professor at KSU who unfortunately only teaches lab. Highly recommend taking him as he's a very lenient grader, yet also seeks to help you learn through thoughtful pre-lab lectures and hands-on labs. He's retired and an expert in his field - and very funny. Highly recommended.

I took him for lab and I would absolutely take him again. I honestly learned more in the lab than I did in my lecture class. He goes over everything before the lab starts and if you have questions he will gladly answer them. He was extremely nice and just wanted to get to know all of his students.

This is the lab professor you want to take. He doesnt make you show every single calculation like most lab profs do. He gives a mini lecture to help you understand the lab better before you do it which really helps you when doing the lab. He is very knowledgeable and can help with any part of a lab you dont understand.

Dr. Sirochman seems to be new at KSU, but is a very caring and knowledgeable lab instructor. He goes out of his way to explain the concepts behind the labs. The labs are fairly simple, and when questions arise he is happy to explain. Would recommend.

Hes a pretty good professor who does engage with each student during the labs. Every lab you miss is a zero NO MAKE UPS! He does drop ONE at the end of the semester! He only grades labs no homework no test no quizzes no final!

Best lab professor ever! Your grade is based only on the labs in class. He is very helpful and provides everything you need to succeed. He answers anything that you have questions about very clearly and gives a brief overview before class on what you will be doing. Would definitely recommend for an easy A!
rating_tags: Caring--Skip class? You won't pass.--Gives good feedback
